EmailTemplate.name: Conversion to Legacy Replacement Scheduled
EmailTemplate.subject: The request to replace {!FS_Execution_Plan__c.FS_Type_of_Replacement__c} has been scheduled
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The request to replace {!FS_Execution_Plan__c.FS_Type_of_Replacement__c} has been scheduled.
Click this link https://freestyle.my.salesforce.com to open the FET site. Then click {!FS_Execution_Plan__c.Link} to be directed to the specific Installation record.
